3eddab-YOUR-INSTANCEID-HERE.title: NDVI
3eddab-YOUR-INSTANCEID-HERE.description: Based on the combination of bands (B8 - B4)/(B8 + B4)

styles.name: default
styles.description:
# Vegetation Index (NDVI)

This index is a simple, but effective way for quantifying green vegetation.

Values description: The value range of an NDVI is `-1` to `1`. Negative values of NDVI (values approaching `-1`) correspond to water. Values close to zero (`-0.1` to `0.1`) generally correspond to barren areas of rock, sand, or snow. Low, positive values represent shrub and grassland (approximately `0.2` to `0.4`), while high values indicate temperate and tropical rainforests (values approaching `1`).

[More...](https://www.sentinel-hub.com/eoproducts/ndvi-normalized-difference-vegetation-index)

6e1aa1-YOUR-INSTANCEID-HERE.title: NDVI
6e1aa1-YOUR-INSTANCEID-HERE.description: Based on the combination of bands (B8 - B4)/(B8 + B4)

styles.name: default
styles.description:
# Vegetation Index (NDVI)

This index is a simple, but effective way for quantifying green vegetation.

Values description: The value range of an NDVI is `-1` to `1`. Negative values of NDVI (values approaching `-1`) correspond to water. Values close to zero (`-0.1` to `0.1`) generally correspond to barren areas of rock, sand, or snow. Low, positive values represent shrub and grassland (approximately `0.2` to `0.4`), while high values indicate temperate and tropical rainforests (values approaching `1`).

[More...](https://www.sentinel-hub.com/eoproducts/ndvi-normalized-difference-vegetation-index)

styles.name: default

items.label: BRDF inversion not performed, no clear observations are available during the accumulation period, i.e. NOBS=0
BRDF inversion failed in one or both spectral bands
BRDF OK, successful inversion in both bands, i.e. optimal quality
BRDF OK with warning, inversion successful but with suspiciously low normalized RED reflectance value
Sea pixel, BRDF inversion not performed
